comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: That's not valid collateral. You need to have something that's worth more than what you're asking for, it cannot be 1:1. Physical items are trouble.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: miawbab on February 10, 2023, 07:55:43 PMI can ship worth of $500 BTC itemsBTC: bc1qaujsyl0zkak5pgkm5f0n9shml7yz4drczft37rhuntest@dnmx.orgI think you have sent me a message in my telegram too. I am sorry, but I can not accept your loan request as I do not accept such type of item/items. As you can send such type of collateral I think it better for you to sell your item. Cause there will have two-way shipping fee which will be more than the amount you may lose for selling the item.
